## isEsError() function

Checks if a given errors originated from Elasticsearch. Those params are assigned to the attributes property of an error.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isEsError(e: any): e is IEsError;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | <code>any</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`e is IEsError`
